nodes.text: The zaviir-juna was a Gand ritual that was needed for a member of the species to proceed to the path of the findsman. This involved the hunting of the greatest findsman of all, namely the Zaviir. The ritual was noted for being a solitary one and must be completed by the prospective Gand findsman alone, without any aid from others.
During the Cold War, Sergeant Yuun informed the new commander of Havoc Squad that he needed to perform the zaviir-juna at the earliest opportunity.
